name: PLANT BRAWL 5
description:
Welcome to PLANT BRAWL 5, a game where you are put in an arena. Every 30 seconds, a new enemy will be put into the spawn pool. Can you survive for 9 minutes of an onslaught of varying enemy types?

Fight 18 enemies that spawn naturally in normal mode + a few extras!

FOUR MODES TO PLAY

Normal - The main mode, play this one first. It's straight to the point

X-treme - Everything is kicked to the next level, the secret characters start spawning in naturally, and many enemies are buffed. You shouldn't play this mode if you're not good...

Bone Zone - Skullies only, which means your opponents are decided by RNG, good luck

Reverse - Fight the foes in the reverse order of normal, which means you'll have to deal with the late game much earlier!

The other 4 games? Eh, you don't need to care about them. The first 3 games were scratch games, and the 4th was less polished than this one.

Everything made by me EXCEPT sfx and music!
